codeName.title: Code Name
codeName.description: A name to uniquely identify this Hotkey between all Hotkeys from all Modules. e.g. core.MasterToggle

category.title: Category
category.description: A Category name to place the Hotkey in, such as for grouped Hotkey listings

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the intended purpose of the Hotkey

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: A collection of Metadata about the Hotkey used for various purposes. For example, metadata may be used to determine whether and when to toggle the Hotkey on and off
